bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Medical Device Communications
Medical Device Data Language (MDDL) Medical Device Specializations
Pulse Oximeter
IEEE Draft Standard for Medical Device Communications - Medical Device Data Language (MDDL) Medical Device Specializations - Pulse Oximeter

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes a model for the implementation of the Pulse Oximeter Virtual Medical Device. It establishes a Design Model and specifies how this Model should be implemented. It also provides guidance concerning bandwidth requirements as well as how to specify conformance with this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
